des: "A delightful wasabi dressing that I whipped up for coleslaw for Memorial Day but could be used in a vast variety of creations. If you want to increase the heat, add more wasabi or add red chili flakes. This can be used as a dressing, marinade, or dip. The possibilities are endless. Fish tacos, anyone?"
ins: Combine vinegar, honey, wasabi paste, peanut butter, light sesame oil, lime juice, soy sauce, black pepper, and dark sesame oil in the bowl of a stand mixer; mix until smooth, using whisk attachment.
